name: proxmox-openapi-artifacts-action
description: GitHub Action that runs the Proxmox OpenAPI automation pipeline.

scripts.bundle:cjs: esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.cjs --sourcemap --external:playwright --external:@apidevtools/swagger-parser --external:yaml --banner:js="const { pathToFileURL } = require('node:url'); const import_meta = { url: pathToFileURL(__filename).href };"
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run bundle:cjs && npm run bundle:esm
scripts.package: npm run typecheck && npm run bundle
